fields.description:
We supply the wrong size graphics for the iPad splash screen graphics. Our graphics omit the height of the status bar, which apparently is not correct. See https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/MobileHIG/IconMatrix.html for proper sizes. The correct graphic sizes are also noted in this link to the TiCons project:

https://github.com/FokkeZB/TiCons-CLI/blob/master/lib/specs.js#L160
fields.summary: Default iPad graphics for new projects are the wrong size

comments.body: New source graphics, courtesy of Tyrus & Marketing attached. Use http://ticons.fokkezb.nl/ to generate proper-size graphics. Make sure to check all supported projects, uncheck the "write to app/assets" checkbox
